attributes.additional_details: IT was reported in the daily news,on the july 31st 20011,that muslims, want shariah law in our country, also that they have set up shariah no go zones, and are conducting thier own courts of law., there is one law in my country, ENGLISH LAW,the goverment must take strong action, againts these muslims, as an ENGLISH DEFENCE LEAGUE MEMBER, i know that we will not stand by and see them make my country into an islamic state,(england love it or leave it)
